author: bridge-bot
content: <TomasGruner> Hey guys! I wanted to talk a bit with other client teams about current lean status and ask some questions. Any client teams up for a meet?

author: bridge-bot
content:

Does it have a name? Grandean? :)

author: bridge-bot
content: <sauliusgr> I guess beacon chain consensus clients will inherit the same name.

author: bridge-bot
content: <sauliusgr> we later plan to move the code to the Grandine's repo once lean becomes a bit more mature and becomes more clear how to share the code.

author: bridge-bot
content: <sauliusgr> the goal would be to inherit the structure/architecture of Grandine without copy/pasting it.
